records.QueryText: spray schedule at pink bud stage ?
records.KccAns:
Pink bud
Dimethoate 30 EC (100 ml) 3
or
Clothianidin 50 WDG (14 g)4
10-14 days after II spray
Ziram 80WP (200 g) or
Mancozeb 75WP (300 g) or
Captan 50WP (300 g) or
Propineb70 WP (300 g) or
Dithianon 75WP (75 g) or
Dodine 65 WP (60 g)5 or
Dodine 40SC (75 ml)
